name: Isla Tortuga
description:
This game takes place on an island of tortuga in 1625 when Spanish defended against English and French. However colonials do not know that this island is in fact a giant turtle who once awoken could change the war completley.

Fun Facts

Isle of tortuga is a real place located on northern coast of haiti, as unfortunate as it isn't a massive turtle however it still has a very rich history. Did you know that Island of tortuga was discovered by Christopher Columbus in his first voyage to new world and, Island of tortuga was a pirate heaven for many years, which is now represented in popular culture in movies such as Pirates of the Caribbean.

Submission for so bad its good jam
